languages.text: "Путем... друкари..." {n}Ирлиэт вторит словам ксеноса словно эхо — столь же слабо и блекло.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Путем... друкари..." {n}Ирлиэт вторит словам ксеноса словно эхо — столь же слабо и блекло.{/n}

languages.text: "The Path... of the Drukhari..." {n}Yrliet echoes the xenos's words, and the sound of her voice is as feeble and hollow as an echo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Путем... друкари..." {n}Ирлиэт вторит словам ксеноса словно эхо — столь же слабо и блекло.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The path... of the Drukhari..." {n}Yrliet repeats after him like an echo, and the sound of her voice is just as weak and hollow.{/n}

languages.text: 「デュカーリの…道…」{n}ユリエットは異種族の言葉を繰り返したが、その声音は弱々しく、空虚なものだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Path... of the Drukhari..." {n}Yrliet echoes the xenos's words, and the sound of her voice is as feeble and hollow as an echo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「デュカーリの…道…」{n}ユリエットは異種族の言葉を繰り返したが、その声音は弱々しく、空虚なものだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “黑暗灵族的……道途……”{n}伊莉耶特重复着黑暗灵族的话语，她的声音微弱而空洞，仿佛回声一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Path... of the Drukhari..." {n}Yrliet echoes the xenos's words, and the sound of her voice is as feeble and hollow as an echo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “黑暗灵族的……道途……”{n}伊莉耶特重复着黑暗灵族的话语，她的声音微弱而空洞。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «La Senda... de los Drukhari...». {n}Yrliet repite las palabras del xenos con una voz débil y vacía como el eco.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Path... of the Drukhari..." {n}Yrliet echoes the xenos's words, and the sound of her voice is as feeble and hollow as an echo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «La Senda... de los Drukhari...». {n}Yrliet se hace eco de las palabras del xenos con una voz débil y vacía.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Der Pfad ... der Drukhari ..." {n}Yrliet wiederholt die Worte der Xenos, und der Klang ihrer Stimme ist schwach und hohl wie ein Echo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Path... of the Drukhari..." {n}Yrliet echoes the xenos's words, and the sound of her voice is as feeble and hollow as an echo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Pfad ... der Drukhari ..." {n}Yrliet wiederholt Echos der Xenos, und der Klang ihrer Stimme ist ebenso schwach und hohl.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « La voie... des Drukharis... » {n}répète d'une voix faible Yrliet en écho au xénos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Path... of the Drukhari..." {n}Yrliet echoes the xenos's words, and the sound of her voice is as feeble and hollow as an echo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La voie... des Drukharis... {n}répète faiblement Yrliet en écho au xénos.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Drukharilerin... Yolu..." {n}Zenonun dediklerini tekrar eden Yrliet'in sesi, kulağa yankı yaparcasına cılız ve içi boş geliyor.{/n}
